body:
New AvP Storm-P28 Gaming Case 
(added blue led fan) 

Amd 6100PM-M2 Motherboard 

AMD Phenom II X2 550 Black Edition Dual-Core 3.1GHz 

Amd Aftermarket Copper Pipe Cpu Cooler 

4GB OCZ Reaper DDR2-800 PC2-6400 Ram 

Seagate 500GB Sata 7200rpm Harddrive 

Asus HD 3870 OC 512mb Graphics Card 
(twin dvi/Tv Out/6pin power) 

Pioneer Multi Dvdwriter 

Creative Audigy Digital 5.1 Sound Card 

G7 Power Extreme 580w Power Supply 

As New Dell E1910 19" Widescreen Monitor 
(VGA/DVI/5ms response time) 

New Dynamode Wireless Usb Dongle 

New Nemesis Kane PRO LED Gaming USB Keyboard/Mouse
